scripts.lint: if-env NODE_ENV=CI && npm run lint: || npm run lint:fix
scripts.start: if-env npm_config_dev=true && npm run start:dev || if-env npm_config_debug=true && npm run start:debug || npm run start:
scripts.start:dev: if-env npm_config_debug=true && cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run start:debug || cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run start:
scripts.test: if-env npm_config_dev=true && npm run test:dev || if-env npm_config_debug=true && npm run test:debug || npm run test:
scripts.test:dev: if-env npm_config_debug=true && cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run test:debug || cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run test:
scripts.update: git submodule update -f & git submodule foreach git pull origin master
